data.code:
# Identifier: sum_numbers
# Input Schema: {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "object", "properties": {"number1": {"type": "number"}, "number2": {"type": "number"}}}}
# Output Schema: {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "object", "properties": {"sum": {"type": "number"}}}}

# Get input data
input_data = executor.get_artifact('input')
number1 = input_data[0]['number1']
number2 = input_data[0]['number2']

# Calculate sum
result = [{'sum': number1 + number2}]

# Store the result
executor.store_artifact('output', 'Sum Result', 'table', result)
